definitions.definition: To deprive of weapons ; to deprive of the means of attack or defense ; to render defenseless .
To deprive of the means or the disposition to harm ; to render harmless or innocuous .
To lay down arms; to stand down .
To reduce one's own military forces .
To render into a state in which something is no longer armed , or prepared for use (such as to disable the security systems on).

main_definition: ( transitive ) To deprive of weapons ; to deprive of the means of attack or defense ; to render defenseless .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To deprive of the means or the disposition to harm ; to render harmless or innocuous .
( intransitive ) To lay down arms; to stand down .
( intransitive ) To reduce one's own military forces .
( transitive ) To render into a state in which something is no longer armed , or prepared for use (such as to disable the security systems on).
